Posts.Content: 123454321 wrote: hello everyone, my girlfriend the other day just noticed that she had a lump towards the inner side of her right breast. it is really hard and it hurts her when she presses down on it firmly. she has had pains in that breast before and she has told me that they would occur before her period. she is only 19 and it is really freaking me out. i am scared and its starting to scare me. she says that this disease does not run in her family but it still scares me. she was a little scared at first too but seems more calm now. i just want the both of us to be at ease. i have read some of the symptons and signs of the disease and that things seem to be in our favor but i just want someone to reassure me. thank you Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: EXTREMELY worried 123454321 crami2
